title: Pixel battery replaced 3x @ authorized repair center within 5 weeks for same battery drain problem!
content: Since the most recent OS update, my pixel has eaten through three batteries -- the original 2 1/2 year old battery and two replacement batteries installed by U Break I Fix, a Google authorized repair center.  It is now in the shop getting a fourth battery.  Each time the phone dies within a few hours after being fully charged.  What gives, Google?
